sqlMap.select:
SELECT ID ,MER_SYS_ID ,SUB_MER_ID ,MER_AMT ,TRANS_FEE ,CLEAR_AMT ,SETTLE_DATE ,RESERVED1 ,RESERVED2 ,RESERVED3 ,ACCOUNT_NUM ,ACCOUNT_NAME ,ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID ,RESERVED4 ,RESERVED5 ,MER_NAME ,MSS_ID FROM STOP_SETTLE_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND STOP_SETTLE_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_AMT) =#mer_amt#
(TRANS_FEE) =#trans_fee#
(CLEAR_AMT) =#clear_amt#
(SETTLE_DATE) =#settle_date#
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NUM) Like '%'||(#account_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#account_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MSS_ID) =#mss_id#
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM STOP_SETTLE_STATICTIS WHERE 1=1 AND STOP_SETTLE_STATICTIS.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(ID) =#id#
(MER_SYS_ID) =#mer_sys_id#
(SUB_MER_ID) =#sub_mer_id#
(MER_AMT) =#mer_amt#
(TRANS_FEE) =#trans_fee#
(CLEAR_AMT) =#clear_amt#
(SETTLE_DATE) =#settle_date#
(RESERVED1) Like '%'||(#reserved1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED2) Like '%'||(#reserved2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED3) Like '%'||(#reserved3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NUM) Like '%'||(#account_num:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_NAME) Like '%'||(#account_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ACCOUNT_AGENCY_ID) Like '%'||(#account_agency_id:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED4) Like '%'||(#reserved4:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVED5) Like '%'||(#reserved5:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MER_NAME) Like '%'||(#mer_name:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(MSS_ID) =#mss_id#
